page.title: 16RECREATION CHILDRENS GAMES.
page.content: { Playground Games. {Marbles }are glass balls 1cm to 4cm diameter.The object of the game is to get your own and the other persons marble into the hole.Instructions. 1)find a hole, 2)move back 10 steps, 3)1st person rolls marble if it goes in the hole,1st person rolls 2nd persons marble, 4)if both marbles are in the hole ,1st person keeps the 2 marbles, 5)if 1st person misses the hole,2nd person rolls his marble, if that goes in the hole 2nd person then rolls 1st persons marble and keeps both if successful. {Squash Tig,}needs 3 or more people.One person is on.Others must say"squash" & stoop down before they are touched.If they do this they cannot be tigged.The last person "squashed" is on.
